results.t: When does the Australian Securities Exchange open and ...
results.p: The market is open 10am to 4pm (Sydney time) on ASX business days. This is called “normal trading”, when most trades take place.
Normal Trading takes place from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm, Sydney time. Brokers enter orders into ASX Trade and ASX Trade matches the orders against each other, ...

results.t: Stock Market & Share Trading Hours | City Index Australia
results.p: Australian exchanges such as the ASX are open from 10:00 to 16:00 AEST. Most share trading hours will run from Monday to Friday, five days a week.
